title: Synergistic effect of modified anhydrous magnesium carbonate and hexaphenoxycyclotriphosphazene on flame retardancy of ethylene-vinyl acetate copolymer
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15143-15154
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01669F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yuan Liu, Shiai Xu, Qinghua Chen, Jie Xu, Beibei Sun
Anhydrous magnesium carbonate (AMC) is successfully modified by KH570. KH570 can improve the interfacial interaction between AMC and EVA. AMC@KH570 and HPCTP generate a synergistic effect on the flame retardancy of EVA.
